title: My Mac used to run LoL with a 80 - 120 FPS.
body:
I do not know if it is league or my Mac. Because my Mac has been able to run league at the best quality with no actual frame drop. The lowest FPS has always been 80 FPS even with the Snow Down map and Apps running in the background. Now its all over from 20 - 140 FPS.

I just wanted to ask the community and RIoters if it is my computer or if there is something up with the client. Because this just recently starting to happen, and my computer has been able to keep that quality from season 5 till recently.

Plz, help.

GL HF

{{sticker:vlad-salute}}

replies.body: Have you tried capping your FPS? Just a start, capping at 60 or just a little lower could reduce temperatures on it and maybe boost performance.
